## Observation notes  
First documented by Taylor, 1884, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime. Biodiversity Galiano Life List: 1985, Galiano. Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. M. Clausen, Masters thesis: 2017, <span class="hl-place-name">Delta</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: 2005; 2007; 2012; 2014, 2015; 2017, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. 2011, <span class="hl-place-name">Abbotsford</span>. 2013; 2015; 2016, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>, from 2015. NBSBC Bee Atlas: 2023, 2024, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. Note: B. californicus and B. fervidus are conspecific, representing two intergrading colour forms.
